summary: Added mazegen/types.py defining immutable core data types Position, Maze, and Solution using typing.NamedTuple.

writes.content:
from __future__ import annotations

from typing import FrozenSet, NamedTuple, Tuple


class Position(NamedTuple):
    row: int
    col: int


class Maze(NamedTuple):
    width: int
    height: int
    seed: int
    start: Position
    end: Position
    passages: FrozenSet[Tuple[Position, Position]]


class Solution(NamedTuple):
    found: bool
    path: Tuple[Position, ...]
